description: Aspose.Email for .NET is a collection of components for working with email from within ASP.NET web applications, web services or Windows applications. It makes it easy to work with Outlook PST, EML, MSG and MHT files.
releaseNotes:
Bugs
NETWORKNET-33376 - Embedded MSG attachment gets corrupted when loading the input MSG file
NETWORKNET-33415 - Attachments not detected by MailMessage.Load() and MapiMessage.FromMailMessage()
NETWORKNET-33425 - Msg with Bullet Points cannot be converted to TIFF
NETWORKNET-33426 - Message Body Formatting Lost with Appointments Attachment
NETWORKNET-33428 - Attachments and Body text problem when EML is loaded into MailMessage
NETWORKNET-33431 - MAPI message from MailMessage - NULL pointer exception
NETWORKNET-33432 - Aspose.iCalendar.RecurrencePattern load wrong DTSTART
NETWORKNET-33438 - Reccurence pattern is converted incorrectly from MailMessage to MapiMessage
NETWORKNET-33439 - Exception at MapiCalendar.Save()
NETWORKNET-33442 - Time zone of Fetched appointment is not the same as original appointment
NETWORKNET-33443 - FolderInfo.AddMessage does not add MapiMessage properly that contains MSG as an attachment
NETWORKNET-33445 - Same name (with Japanese characters) assigned to all attachments when added to a message
NETWORKNET-33471 - Incorrect unfolding in FetchMessage function with unicode value in subject 
NETWORKNET-33322 - Mail headers show garbage characters instead of chinese characters (.NET)
NETWORKNET-33380 - Aspose.Email for .NET - Attachment File Name Corruption (#42009)
NETWORKNET-33417 - Invitation sent through ExchangeWebServiceClient Appears twice in Calendar after acceptance
NETWORKNET-33419 - Issue with loading Embedded MSG attachment using MailMessage
NETWORKNET-33421 - Strange characters in subject of email
NETWORKNET-33424 - Convert Electronic Signature from .Eml to .Msg
NETWORKNET-33430 - How to send MailMessage through proxy server address
NETWORKNET-33444 - Msg Body is returned null while reading a MSG file that was saved with Aspose Email
NETWORKNET-33447 - PST cannot be opened in Outlook when created by Aspose.Email and Appointment messages are added
NETWORKNET-33466 - Resultant PST cannot be opened in Outlook when extracted MSGs are added to it
NETWORKNET-33467 - Dealing with OLE Data in MapiAttachments
NETWORKNET-33468 - PST created with Aspose.Email 2.1.0 can't be imported in Outlook

Enhancements
NETWORKNET-33349 - In order to display the complete embedded image, auto set the dimensions of the Tiff file when printing with Aspose.Email.Printing
NETWORKNET-33354 - Does Aspose.Email for .NET supports Exchange Impersonation
NETWORKNET-33377 - Time Out feature while loading files with Aspose Email
NETWORKNET-33416 - Extract x number of messages by providing m and n as start and End indexes

New Features
NETWORKNET-33329 - GenerateOccurrences() required for MapiCalendarRecurrencePattern Similar to RecurrencePattern class
NETWORKNET-33366 - Save EML as Draft
NETWORKNET-33422 - Check if a PST is password protected
summary: Aspose.Email for .NET is a component to work with Email files
title: Aspose.Email for .NET
